about_the_game:
A non-linear detective adventure. Investigate the mysterious disappearance of a successful CEO by analysing documents from her home and office. Examine evidence, connect clues, and make your own deductions to uncover a case of fraud. Inspired by open-ended deduction games like Return of the Obra Dinn, The Roottrees are Dead and Case of the Golden Idol.

Zoolingo is a seemingly successful startup company aiming to build a translation app that allows people to understand their pets. After landing an enormous amount of investor funding, the CEO has disappeared under suspicious circumstances. Only a few documents have escaped the shredder. Piece together the identities and roles of her family and employees, figure out who had motive and opportunity, and construct a case to unravel the fraudulent scheme.

Features:

  • Non-linear gameplay:
    Progression is in your mind! Explore evidence however you want. Connect clues and form your own theories with no hand-holding.

  • A complex case:
    Exposing the fraudulent operation won’t be easy. You’ll need to discover missing identities, decipher clues from the past, and make logical deductions to bring it all together and crack the case.

  • Lots of cute pets:
    Deduce the identities of the employees’ adorable animal companions!
